summary: The adventures of a little penguin living in Antarctica.
cast: Rolan Bykov|Vyacheslav Nevinnyy|Evgeniy Leonov|Yuriy Volyntsev|Elena Sanaeva|Nikolay Grabbe|Vladimir Ferapontov|Vyacheslav Bogachyov|Vladimir Soshalsky|Svetlana Stepchenko|Yuri Andreyev|Anatoliy Solovyov|Lyudmila Gnilova|Tatyana Kuryanova|Natalya Chenchik|Aleksey Batalov|Virginia Masters|David Miles Monson|William Oliver|Danielle Romeo|William Romeo|Cody Walker|Tyler Weed
director: Directors: Gennadiy Sokolskiy (as G. Sokolskiy), Kenji Yoshida (as K. Yoshida)
title: Priklyucheniya pingvinenka Lolo. Film pervyy
